text: You don't need more time. You need fewer excuses.
author: Ahmad

text: Ambition is real. Actions are fake.
author: Anonymous

text: Keep working hard. One day you will give up.
author: Ahmad

text: If at first you don't succeed… lower your standards.
author: Stupid Fox (inspired by 'The Fox and the Grapes')

text: Don't worry, it gets worse.
author: Ahmad

text: Be weaker than your excuses. It's easier.
author: Ali

text: Success is overrated. Sleep is real.
author: Jobeless boy (practically proven)

text: Work smart, not hard. Or better… don't work at all.
author: Meer Ali

text: Motivation is temporary. Laziness is forever.
author: Ahmad

text: Chase your dreams. They're faster than you.
author: Dreamer

text: Failure builds character. Good thing you're building a lot.
author: Ahmad

text: Try less. Disappoint fewer.
author: Ahmad

text: Give up. It's cheaper.
author: Ahmad

text: Never be the fastest worker. You'll become the default worker.
author: Truth Seeker

text: The corporate ladder is just stress with better titles.
author: X Employee

text: Stay average. It's safe.
author: Meer Rehan Ahmad Mallah

text: Do nothing. It's consistent.
author: Ahmad

text: If you finish early, add 'pending review' and relax.
author: Corporate Labour

text: Keep trying. Failure loves consistency.
author: Ahmad

text: Motivation is fake. Nap is real.
author: Ahmad

text: You can't fail if you never start.
author: Anonymous

text: Try again. Make it worse.
author: Ahmad

text: At least you tried. That's enough embarrassment.
author: Meer Rehan Ahmad Mallah

text: Work hard? Nah. Look busy. That's the promotion strategy.
author: Ahmad

text: Never solve a problem too well. They'll make it your job forever.
author: Ahmad

text: Managers don't want results. They want updates.
author: Ahmad

text: Productivity is optional. Attendance is mandatory.
author: Corporate Labour Union
